Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 38th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1980...
Injured on 8/29/1981 with a Bruised Hip, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/18/1982 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/1983 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 9/5/1983 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1984, off Rick Sutcliffe (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1984, off John Montefusco (PHI)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 4/18/1986 (Going to HOU: LF D. Justice, C M. Salas. Going to CHC: C M. Tettleton, CF L. Dykstra, 2B W. Backman, P D. Rozema)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1987...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 5/14/1988...
